title: Synergistic action of highly-active porous carbon-based bifunctional electrocatalysts and neutral electrolyte: endowing zincâ€“air batteries with ultra-long cycle stability
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE01603J, Paper
Juanjuan Zhao, Xiaohang Ma, Lingyun Liu, Weiguang Fang, Zhenfa Zi, Mingzai Wu
A honeycomb N/S co-doped Co9S8 nanoparticle material loaded with porous carbon skeleton (N/SdCF-OIM/Co9S8) as cathode catalyst was designed by using Co-MOF and SiO2 spheres. The ZABs based on N/SdCF-OIM/Co9S8 in neutral electrolyte have longer cycle stability than in alkaline electrolytes.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
